alert.note: Alert for Edwards; Kinney; Real; Uvalde (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 10 at 3:43PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Kinney, northwestern Uvalde, south central Edwards and southwestern Real Counties through 430 PM CDT... At 341 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms in rural southeast Edwards County and southwest Real County. Movement was south at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Camp Wood, Reagan Wells, Montell, Vance, Barksdale, and Garner State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
